EmailTemplate.name: RE: Nicolette's contact info (1358796765.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Nicolette's contact info (1358796765.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dave, Per Tom’s email I wanted to take a moment to introduce myself as your point of contact at MBO Partners to answer any questions you may have about our program. You may select a convenient time for us to speak by clicking on the link in the email from Steve Taggart below and if you do not see a time that works for you please do not hesitate to reach out to me with a different proposed time. Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you! Have a great afternoon,Nicolette From: Thomas Martin [mailto:TMartin@forcemanagement.com] Sent: Friday, January 18, 2013 11:28 AM To: Nicolette Taylor; Dave Milam (dbmilam@gmail.com) Subject: RE: Nicolette's contact info Dave & Nicolette – per separate emails here is your introduction. Dave, Nicolette is out of the office today but her scheduling link below will make it easy for you to set up a call with her early next week. Regards,Tom From: Steven Taggart [mailto:staggart@mbopartners.com <mailto:staggart@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Friday, January 18, 2013 10:35 AM To: tcm@strategy2revenue.com <mailto:tcm@strategy2revenue.com> Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Nicolette's contact info Hi Tom,Thanks for your time and help. You mentioned you have a guy from Austin to refer to MBO. With Sarah Conde out of the office, Nicolette Taylor is a great alternative contact. Your contact can feel free to schedule time with Nicolette by using this scheduling link <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. Another option is to simply fill out the “Let’s Talk” form at www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com> or call 1-800-220-0469. Also, her contact info is below. Nicolette Taylorntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>703-793-6281 Warm regards,Steve ___________________________________Steve TaggartAccount Executive, Enterprise SolutionsMBO Partners t: 703.793.6014f: 703.793.6452e: staggart@mboenterprise.com <mailto:staggart@mbopartners.com>w: www.mboenterprise.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
